[Bear Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=4090) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

</column>

---

You have a magical affinity for [bears](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=13) and can speak to them through sounds and body language. You can communicate with all bears, as well as other ursine creatures at the GM's discretion.
